Consignment Management

Supervise your consignment stock system between consignees with Consignment Management app in Odoo. With the Consignment Management app from Emipro, you are equipped with optimal consignment operations carried out in Odoo that makes the transactions between you and your consignee, even smoother & smarter. With Consignment Management app user can manage all transactions with their consignee. In that Consignment Stock Transfer, Consignment Order Management, Consignee to Consignee Stock Transfer, Consignment Return Management and Consignment Stock Report will be covered.

Request a Free Demo

Highlights

Consignee Stock Management

It keeps the history of all the transactions with a consignee.

Consignment Transfer

Allow you to do the transfer from your warehouse to consignees location, in that ownership of the stock is of the company.

Import Consignment Transfer

Provides an option to Import Consignment Transfer.


Consignee to Consignee Stock Transfer

Allow to transfer stock between consignee, still, the ownership of the stock is of company.

Import Consignee to Consignee Stock Transfer

Allow importing consignee to consignee stock transfer.

Manage Consignment Orders

Allow to generate sales order of consumed stock by the consignee and the ownership will be transferred to the customer.

Import Consignment Orders

Allow importing consignment orders.


Consignment Product Returns

Allow getting the stock back to the warehouse which is shipped to the consignee and is not consumed or not sold.

Import Consignment Product Return

Allow to import consignment product return.

Consignment Stock Report

Allow generating a stock report in multiple formats and quick view of report is also available.

  • Manage multiple consignees with their individual virtual locations in Odoo.
  • Transfer the stock to your consignees at your fingertips.
  • Settle the products sold by consignee with Consignment Orders.
  • Hassle-free Consignment Returns & Inventory Adjustment.
  • One-click import all consignment transactions.
  • Track your & your consignees inventory quickly and easily.
  • In-depth stock report with finest UI.
  • Identify the transactional errors with Mismatch Logs.

Is this app compatible with Odoo Enterprise as well as Community?

Yes, the app works perfectly well with Odoo Enterprise (On-premise and Odoo.SH) as well as Community. Odoo Online (Cloud) does not allow installation of third-party apps and hence this app cannot be installed on Odoo Online.

I need an extra feature in this app. How can I request it?

You can contact us to request a customization in the app.

Do I get free upgrades and support if I purchase the app?

If you purchase our app for Odoo Version 12 and prior, we will provide you access to all the versions up to 12 depending on their availability. Starting version 13, every version of the app will be sold separately.

We offer free support for a duration of 90 days from the date of purchase. Kindly read our support policy to know the details.

Is it possible to manage consignment stock in this app?

Yes, this app can manage consignment stock.

How can I track the Consignment Stock ?

This app lets you generate a report for tracking consignment stock. You can view an on-screen report in Odoo or can download a PDF or Excel file.

Will the system deduct stock from consignee location after transferring consignment order?

Yes, once a consignment delivery order is shipped, the stock will be automatically deducted from the consignee's location.

Is it possible to transfer stock between consignees?

Yes, this app provides a separate option that lets you transfer stock from one consignee to another consignee.

Does this app allow to import Consignment Orders, Consignment Transfers and Consignment Returns?

Yes, the app contains an import feature that lets you import a CSV/excel file containing Consignment Orders, Consignment Transfers, Consignee to Consignee Transfers and Consignment Returns.
